mapper.select: select pr.id as product_review_id, pr.like_count as like_count, p.id as product_id, p.name as product_name, p.price as product_price, p.photo as product_photo, g.total as grade_total, g.id as grade_id, g.taste as grade_taste, g.cost_ratio as grade_cost_ratio, g.calory as grade_calory from tbl_product_review as pr inner join tbl_product as p inner join tbl_grade as g on pr.product_id = #{id} and pr.grade_id = g.id

select ur.id as user_review_id, ur.content1 as user_review_content1, ur.content2 as user_review_content2, ur.content3 as user_review_content3, ur.help_count as user_review_help_count, ur.regdate as user_review_regdate, u.id as user_id, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.photo as user_photo, g.id as grade_id, g.total as grade_total, g.taste as grade_taste, g.cost_ratio as grade_cost_ratio, g.calory as grade_calory, p.id as product_review_id from tbl_user_review as ur inner join tbl_user as u inner join tbl_grade as g inner join tbl_product_review as p on ur.product_review_id = #{id} and g.id = ur.grade_id and u.id = ur.user_id

select ur.id as user_review_id, ur.content1 as user_review_content1, ur.content2 as user_review_content2, ur.content3 as user_review_content3, ur.help_count as user_review_help_count, ur.regdate as user_review_regdate, u.id as user_id, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.photo as user_photo, g.id as grade_id, g.total as grade_total, g.taste as grade_taste, g.cost_ratio as grade_cost_ratio, g.calory as grade_calory, p.id as product_review_id from tbl_user_review as ur inner join tbl_user as u inner join tbl_grade as g inner join tbl_product_review as p on ur.id = #{id} and u.id = #{user_id} and g.id = #{grade_id}
